headline: D.R. Horton, Inc. Announces Pricing of $500 Million of 4.850% Senior Notes Due 2030
summary: ARLINGTON, Texas, April 28, 2025--D.R. Horton announced that it has priced $500 million of 4.850% senior notes due 2030.
